__e: I'd rather split a Kit Kat in a bathroom with you any day.
But I just wondered if I could walk round with you for a while because my sister Kit Kat is about to leave...
That's all you got? I could march right up to my old house and ask my sister for a kit kat.
It wouldn't do to have her body pop up now that Kit Walker has confessed to all those horrendous murders.
And have Kit Walker brought to my office at 3:00 today.
My name is Kit Walker... and I murdered my wife.
